mapper.insert: insert into shopreview(reviewno, shopid, userid, shopreview, filename1) values(#{reviewno},#{shopid},#{userid},#{shopreview},#{filename1})
mapper.select: select a.reviewno, a.shopid, a.userid, a.shopreview, date_format(a.writedate,"%m/%d %H:%i") writedate, a.filename1, b.shopid, b.shopname, b.shopaddr, b.shopnumber from shopreview a right outer join shop b on a.shopid = b.shopid where b.shopid=${param1} order by a.reviewno desc
mapper.delete: delete from shopreview where reviewno=${param1} and userid=#{param2}
